A

addListener(ProcessListener) - Method in class ProcessManager
Subscribes a process listener to the manager instance.

C

cancel() - Method in class ProcessManager
It prompts the currently running process, if there is one, to terminate.
clearListeners() - Method in class ProcessManager
Removes all subscribed listeners.
close() - Method in class ProcessManager
 
close() - Method in class PSPPool
 
CommandListener - Interface in net.viktorc.pspp.core
A listener that allows for the processing of the outputs of a process.
CommandSubmission - Class in net.viktorc.pspp.core
A class that holds all information necessary for executing and processing commands in #ProcessManager instances.
CommandSubmission(String, CommandListener, boolean) - Constructor for class CommandSubmission
Constructs an instance according to the specified parameters.
CommandSubmission(String, CommandListener) - Constructor for class CommandSubmission
Constructs an instance according to the specified parameters.

D

doCancelAfterwards() - Method in class CommandSubmission
Returns whether the process should be cancelled after the execution of the command.

E

executeCommand(CommandSubmission) - Method in class ProcessManager
Attempts to write the specified command followed by a new line to the standard in stream of the process and blocks until it is processed.

G

getCommand() - Method in class CommandSubmission
Returns the command to write to the process' standard in.
getId() - Method in class ProcessManager
Returns the 64 bit ID number of the instance.
getListener() - Method in class CommandSubmission
Returns the #CommandListener instance for consuming the subsequent outputs of the process and for determining whether the process has finished processing the command and is ready for new commands based on these outputs.

I

isReady() - Method in class ProcessManager
Returns whether the manager is ready process new commands.
isRunning() - Method in class ProcessManager
Returns whether the process is currently running.

N

net.viktorc.pspp.core - package net.viktorc.pspp.core
 

O

onFinished() - Method in interface CommandListener
A method called once the post-processing activities associated with the command has been completed.
onNewErrorOutput(String) - Method in interface CommandListener
A method called every time a new line is printed to the error out stream of the process after a command has been sent to it and it has not finished processing it up until now.
onNewStandardOutput(String) - Method in interface CommandListener
A method called every time a new line is printed to the standard out stream of the process after a command has been sent to it and it has not finished processing it up until now.
onStarted(ProcessManager) - Method in interface ProcessListener
A method called right after the process is started.
onSubmitted() - Method in interface CommandListener
A method called once the command has been written to the process' standard in.
onTermination(int) - Method in interface ProcessListener
A method called right after the process terminates.

P

ProcessListener - Interface in net.viktorc.pspp.core
An interface for listeners for the #ProcessManager class.
ProcessManager - Class in net.viktorc.pspp.core
A class for starting, managing, and interacting with processes.
ProcessManager(ProcessBuilder, long) - Constructor for class ProcessManager
Constructs a manager for the specified process without actually starting the process.
ProcessManagerException - Exception in net.viktorc.pspp.core
An exception thrown by the #ProcessManager class if an unexpected error occurs that solicits that instantaneous termination of the process.
ProcessManagerException(Exception) - Constructor for exception ProcessManagerException
The only constructor.
PSPPool - Class in net.viktorc.pspp.core
A class for maintaining and managing a pool of identical pre-started processes.
PSPPool(ProcessBuilder, ProcessListener, int, int, int, long) - Constructor for class PSPPool
Constructs a pool of identical processes.

R

removeListener(ProcessListener) - Method in class ProcessManager
Removes a process listener from the manager instance if it is already subscribed.
run() - Method in class ProcessManager
 

S

setLogging(boolean) - Method in class PSPPool
Sets whether the pool should log to the console.
submitCommand(CommandSubmission) - Method in class PSPPool
Executes the command on any of the available processes in the pool.

T

toString() - Method in class ProcessManager
 

U

UNEXPECTED_TERMINATION_RESULT_CODE - Static variable in class ProcessManager
If the process cannot be started or an exception occurs which would make it impossible to retrieve the actual result code of the process.
